												I bought several (non-Steam) versions of Baseball Mogul over the years and have likely spent thousands of hours playing this game over the years.  While it isn't as deep or as realistic as OOTP, it is easy to pick up and play and still offers a deep simulation of MLB starting in any season from 1901 through 2014.  If you want to actually pitch, hit and field, Baseball Mogul isn't for you but if you'd rather run the team and want a game that allows you to do exactly that without having to worry about all the complicated details, Mogul is for you.  In Baseball Mogul, you can play 10 seasons in a single setting, set your lineup on a daily basis or manage your team pitch-by-pitch.  You can even simulate 500 seasons at a time with the Play Multiple Seasons feature.  There's plenty of depth in Baseball Mogul to keep those of us who enjoy the statistical side of the sport playing for years.
